content:
Dear CLAIRE Community,
To make it easier for everyone to know who they are talking to, please consider using the user name template :
<contact first name> <contact last name> (<name of group / institution>, <2-letter-country abbreviation>)
e.g. Morten Irgens (Oslo Metropolitan University, NO)

Quick reminder to those that have been added to the platform recently and may have not seen the message above:

To make it easier for everyone to know who they are talking to, please consider using the user name template :
<contact first name> <contact last name> (<name of group / institution>, <2-letter-country abbreviation>)
e.g. Morten Irgens (Oslo Metropolitan University, NO)
Test to see whether I can follow instructions :-)
As expected Lynda, you pass with cum laude!
Perfect. Good to have you here, Lynda. Are you up for an advanced task? If so, subscribe to the CLAIRE/NL stream :-)
